generated_caption: This statistic shows the annual turnover of the digital camera manufacturing industry in Romania from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , digital camera manufacturing yielded a turnover of approximately 218.4 million euros .

The statistic shows change in gross fixed capital formation in the Netherlands from 1st quarter 2015 to 1st quarter 2021 . It is a key factor in calculating gross domestic product . GFCF can increase due to investment , for instance , and it can decrease when fixed assets are sold or disposed of .

The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers ( USACOE ) has the authority to construct and maintain navigable waters and related works , as provided for by the Rivers and Harbors Act of 1899 and subsequent legislation . This statute authorizes the construction of navigable waters , as well as related works such as locks , dams , and canals , in the interest of commerce and navigation on the navigable rivers and waterways of the United States . The USACOE is also responsible for the management and protection of the nation 's inland waterways and waterways infrastructure . The statute further provides that the USACOE may acquire lands or property , including water rights , for the purpose of carrying out its duties . This statute has been the basis for many federal laws and programs related to inland waterways .

This statistic shows the volume of ethylene oxide ( EO ) imported in the United States between 2008 and 2018 , in thousand tons . In 2018 , 2,511 thousand tons of EO were imported into the U.S .

This statistic shows the number of people who have used a social media site in the last three months and their reasons for using it in Great Britain from April 2012 to February 2016 . Of the respondents aged 18 to 24 years , 96 percent have used Facebook .
In 2020 , average price per unit of air freight for Asia Pacific was 1,099 U.S. dollars . This value was estimated by IATA to increase by 11.5 percent between 2011 and 2021 .

The average daily consumption of beverage alcohol per capita in the United Kingdom ( UK ) was measured to have been around 1.1 liters from 2006 to 2017 . During this period , the consumption of beverage alcohol increased slightly . This statistic is based on data provided by the Office for National Statistics .

In 2020 , the value of U.S. exports of goods and services was 3.28 trillion United States dollars . In 1990 , U.S. exports of goods and services was valued at approximately 3.18 trillion U.S. dollars .

The COVID-19 pandemic is expected to negatively affect the revenue of the U.S. restaurant industry . As of May 2020 , the restaurant industry was expected to see its revenue drop by 15 billion U.S. dollars due to the COVID-19 outbreak .

This statistic shows the results of a survey among 21 to 30 year olds in Italy on their daily online activities as of December 2016 . During the survey period , it was found that 18 percent of respondents said that they used social networking websites such as Twitter or Facebook at least three times a day .

As of March 2020 , 36 percent of respondents in the United States had heard of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) . In comparison , the share of respondents who had heard of the coronavirus in the United Kingdom was 65 percent .

In 2020 , the share of children and young adults who had a positive opinion of the United States increased by 11 percentage points compared to 2019 , to 56 percent . The share of people who viewed the United States negatively decreased to 18 percent from 23 percent .

This statistic shows the total number of people employed in the manufacturing industry of rubber products in Italy from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the Italian manufacturing industry of rubber products employed a total number of 10,004 people .
